verses.verse: <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> who was of the <S%H8453>foreigners<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> there shall not be <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> these <S%H8141>years,<s%> but <S%H6310>according<s%> to my <S%H1697>word.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying,

<S%H3212>"Go<s%> away from <S%H6437>here,<s%> turn <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> and <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
It shall <S%H8354>be,<s%> that you shall drink of the <S%H5158>brook.<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> to feed you <S%H3557>there.<s%>"

So he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

The <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and he <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook.<s%>
It happened <S%H7093>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that the <S%H5158>brook<s%> dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> because there was no <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying,

<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath,<s%> which belongs to <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and <S%H3427>stay<s%> <S%H6680>there.<s%> Behold, I have commanded a <S%H490%H99999>widow<s%> there to sustain <S%H3557>you.<s%>"

So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath;<s%> and when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6607>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H490>behold,<s%> a widow <S%H802><s%> was there <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H559>her,<s%> and said, "Please <S%H3947>get<s%> me a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

As she was <S%H3212>going<s%> to <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H7121>it,<s%> he called to <S%H559>her,<s%> and said, "Please <S%H3947>bring<s%> me a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I <S%H3426>don't<s%> have a <S%H4580>cake,<s%> but a <S%H4393>handful<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> in the <S%H3537>jar,<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> in the <S%H6835>jar.<s%> <S%H7197>Behold,<s%> I am gathering <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6086>sticks,<s%> that I may go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H6213>bake<s%> it for me and my <S%H1121>son,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4191>it,<s%> and die."

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>her,<s%> "Don't be afraid. <S%H935>Go<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said;<s%> but <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H8033>of<s%> it a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5692>cake<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> it out to <S%H314>me,<s%> and afterward <S%H6213>make<s%> some for you and for your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3537><s%> 'The jar of <S%H7058>meal<s%> shall not <S%H3615>empty,<s%> neither shall the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>fail,<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>sends<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>'"
She <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah:<s%> and <S%H1004>she,<s%> and he, and her house, <S%H398>ate<s%> many <S%H3117>days.<s%>

The <S%H3537>jar<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> <S%H3615>didn't<s%> empty, neither did the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2638>fail,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>

It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> fell <S%H2470>sick;<s%> and his <S%H2483>sickness<s%> was <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H2389>severe,<s%> that there was no <S%H5397>breath<s%> left in <S%H3498>him.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> "What have I to do with <S%H376>you,<s%> you man of <S%H430>God?<s%> You have <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H2142>bring<s%> my <S%H5771>sin<s%> to <S%H2142>memory,<s%> and to <S%H4191>kill<s%> my <S%H1121>son!<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5414>her,<s%> "Give me your <S%H1121>son.<s%>" He <S%H3947>took<s%> him out of her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and carried him <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H5944>room<s%> where he <S%H3427>stayed,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on his own <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

He <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> have you also brought <S%H7489>evil<s%> on the <S%H490>widow<s%> with whom I <S%H1481>stay,<s%> by <S%H4191>killing<s%> her <S%H1121>son?<s%>"

He <S%H4058>stretched<s%> himself on the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> please let this <S%H3206>child<s%>'s <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> into <S%H7130>him<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah;<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> into <S%H7130>him<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and he <S%H2421>revived.<s%>

<S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> out of the <S%H5944>room<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H2088>"Now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H571>truth.<s%>"
